text: Donald Barrington Buchanan or Danny Buck (born in Saint Elizabeth Parish on September 28, 1942; died January 10, 2011) was a former Minister of Labour and Social Security for Jamaica.Profiles of Cabinet Ministers He also served in the Parliament of Jamaica where he represented St. Elizabeth South Western. He died of Colorectal cancer. His son is also a politician.Jamaica Observer obituary from January 12, 2011 == References == Category:Government ministers of Jamaica Category:People's National Party (Jamaica) politicians Category:People from Saint Elizabeth Parish Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:1942 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer in Jamaica
title: Donald Buchanan
